titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the Honourable House of Commons, at their publique fast, Novemb. 29. 1643. By VVilliam Bridge, sometimes fellow of Emanuel Colledge in Cambridge, now preacher of Gods Word at Yarmouth.
titleStmt.author: Bridge, William, 1600?-1670.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon preached at the late fast, before the Honourable House of Commons.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
